quoteText: I don't know what drives me to succeed.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: I never had a speech from my father 'this is what you must do or shouldn't do' but I just learned to be led by example. My father wasn't perfect.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: I'm not comfortable being around too many people. I don't like being out in public too much. I don't like going to bars. I don't like doing celebrity stuff. So most of the characters I play are people who don't always feel comfortable beyond their small circle of friends.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: It's nice when little teams win.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: I still get very scared when I step in front of a live audience.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: Now that I'm a parent, I understand why my father was in a bad mood a lot.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: I grew up cursing a lot. It felt natural. My parents told me to stop.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: I've been called a moron since I was about four. My father called me a moron. My grandfather said I was a moron. And a lot of times when I'm driving, I hear I'm a moron. I like being a moron.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: I sing seriously to my mom on the phone. To put her to sleep, I have to sing 'Maria' from West Side Story. When I hear her snoring, I hang up.
author: Adam Sandler

quoteText: How do I speak Spanish? Not too well.
author: Adam Sandler
